data.description: Belvedere is the newest Great Southern Homes neighborhood in the Pendleton area very conveniently located between Clemson and Anderson. This 3 bedroom, 2 bath, one story, 1,567 square foot home has luxury vinyl plank flooring in the entire home, and a breezy screened porch off the kitchen. This beautiful home boasts expansive granite countertops and stainless steel appliances. There is an extra gas line if you want a gas stove.  This is a Green Smart, highly energy efficient home (https://www.greatsouthernhomes.com/greensmart-homes) with an irrigation system, a tankless water heater, sentricon termite control, Honeywell Home Automation System, and an audio docking system with speakers, music port, and USB charging ports. Call to learn first hand about the extras in this magnificent home.
